summary: This is an email chain from July 2019 discussing the need for a contact at Deutsche Bank or its legal representation, prompted by a New York Times article about Jeffrey Epstein's net worth. It shows coordination among individuals seeking information related to Epstein's financial dealings.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Mentioned in the context of a New York Times article about his net worth, which prompted the email discussion seeking a Deutsche Bank contact.

events.title: NYT publishes article on Epstein's net worth
events.description: The New York Times publishes an article about Jeffrey Epstein's net worth, which serves as the catalyst for the email chain seeking a Deutsche Bank contact.

keyFacts: An email chain dated July 11, 2019, shows individuals seeking a contact at Deutsche Bank or its legal counsel.
The request is linked to a New York Times article published on July 10, 2019, about Jeffrey Epstein's net worth.
The correspondence indicates active interest or investigation into Epstein's financial relationships around the time of the article's publication.
